price: To je zato što su govorili onima koji ne vole ono što Allah objavljuje: "Mi ćemo vam se u nečemu pokoravati", a Allah dobro zna njihove tajne.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُواْ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي بَعۡضِ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِسۡرَارَهُمۡ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum qālū lilladhīna karihū mā nazzala al-lahu sanuṭīʿukum fī baʿḍi al-amri wal-lahu yaʿlamu is'rārahum
